channel.description: Recent content in Alex Lynd on

item.title: Work
item.description: Video Content Thistle Security Easy OTA Updates on the Raspberry Pi Hak5 WiFi Coconut Setup & Recon w/ Wireshark Find Hidden Spy Cameras in Your Airbnb w/ Wireshark How Hackers Use DNS Spoofing to Phish Passwords (WiFi Pineapple) Can Linux Aliases Steal Your Password? (Bash Bunny) How to Defend Against WiFi Attacks & WiFi Pineapples Create Rogue Networks on the WiFi Pineapple (PineAP KARMA Attacks) Track WiFi Devices from the Air with a WarFlying Drone

item.title: About Me
item.description: Alex Lynd is a hardware hacker & cybersecurity instructor who builds low-cost wireless hacks, and environmental-focused projects at LyndLabs. He creates educational hacking videos & cybersecurity content for beginners on shows like Hak5, and also created the Nugget, a cat-shaped hardware console that makes it fun to learn hacking! Contact Me For business inquiries and work, you can reach out to me on Twitter or send an email to alex@alexlynd.com. You can also find me on LinkedIn.
